title: The Task Force hosted 1st meeting
content: The Task Force hosted 1st community meeting in the club house. More the 30 parents joined the event and discussed their concerned on the school boundary options.

title: Potomac Glen School Boundary Task Force form
content: Residents in Potomac Glen aligned with HOA and formed the task force.

title: Awareness of the school redistricting
content: Potomac Glen parents formed groups to study the impact of the school redistricting.
